casebody.data:
GEORGE WITTNER, ET AL., PLAINTIFFS-RESPONDENTS, v. HENRY W. METZGER, ET AL., DEFENDANTS-PETITIONERS. Mr. Benjamin Gross and Mr. John Drewen for the petitioners. Mr. Max L. Bosenstein and Mr. Harry A. Margolis for the respondents. May 14, 1962.

See same case below: 72 N. J. Super. 438.
